title: Spotted: Prototype, next gen XC MTB tires from Maxxis, Michelin & Schwalbe
content:
World Cup races and end-of-season events are perfect for data collection on prototype products. Manufacturers get the full expression of the athlete’s performance, plus piles of post-race data. It’s also an excellent time to sneak a peek at designs nearing the final stages before full production. Many teams and athletes were running preproduction gear at

The post Spotted: Prototype, next gen XC MTB tires from Maxxis, Michelin & Schwalbe appeared first on Bikerumor.
author: Jordan Villella
